actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of September 7, 1950 (relating to the construction of a public airport in or near the District of Columbia), to authorize arrests for offenses committed on lands acquired to provide access to the airport.

summary.text: Amends the Act authorizing construction of Dulles Airport, Virginia, to expand the definition of airport under such Act thereby enlarging the jurisdiction of the United States Park Police at such airport and authorizing certain other actions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of September 7, 1950 (relating to the construction of a public airport in or near the District of Columbia), to authorize arrests for offenses committed on lands acquired to provide access to the airport.
